about_the_game:
Somewhere, sometime, among the mountains of an oddly electrified celestial body... proudly stands the ever-mysterious city of Taro, known for its vast valleys and unreachable golden spires - marvels of technology that were once comfortably inhabited by the city's richest.
The valleys themselves, still full of people, are home to one especially curious person.

Ward.
A middle-aged Felek with a lot on his mind... and a lot on his shoulders.

Although plain and unorganized, Ward's unnatural sense of wanderlust always made him stand out - for better or worse, It took him places where most Felek would not care nor want to think about, or feel feelings most Felek would find hard to empathise with.

His condition left him living a life of a wanderer. Estranged. Not fully understood, wherever he went.
His family, friends - forgotten, with silence ringing on both ends.
His search for greater things in life - a blind end.
After many years spent being lost, it was time for Ward to return home, and reach back to his old friends.
.
That streak of stagnation, however, was subject to drastically change in a mere matter of days.
Unbeknowst to him, heralded by odd dreams and happenings, his uniqueness will soon let him experience things most Felek would not be worthy of seeing...
...for better, or worse.

Ghost Of Fall is a hand-drawn 2D adventure game, with a heavy emphasis on its story, atmosphere, satisfying puzzles and fights.

The gameplay consists of:
  • Exploring a beautifully hand-crafted world full of detailed, animated, highly interactive locations.
  • Solving satisfying puzzles with ASMR audio.
  • Fighting powerful opponents in rhythm-based battles.
  • Getting to know a colourful cast of characters... that may or may not want to be Ward's friend.
  • ...and enjoying the atmospheric original soundtrack performed by Felocai.
